<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> &#42;R = V-&gt;getDefiningRecipe();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R &amp;&amp; V-&gt;isDefinedOutsideLoopRegions()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(V-&gt;getDefiningRecipe(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123; return isUniformAcrossVFsAndUFs(Op); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CanonicalIV = R-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getPlan()-&gt;getCanonicalIV();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Canonical IV chain is uniform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V == CanonicalIV || V == CanonicalIV-&gt;getBackedgeValue())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typeswitch/#a78c545287cbe57529ce7751e25c815a5">Case</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpderivedivrecipe">VPDerivedIVRecipe</a>&gt;(&#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;R) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .Case&lt;VPReplicateRecipe&gt;(&#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loads and stores that are uniform across VF lanes are handled by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPReplicateRecipe.IsUniform. They are also uniform across UF parts if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all their operands are invariant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Further relax the restrictions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R-&gt;isUniform() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">               (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst, StoreInst&gt;</a>(R-&gt;getUnderlyingValue())) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(R-&gt;operands(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .Case&lt;VPScalarCastRecipe, VPWidenCastRecipe&gt;(&#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A cast is uniform according to its operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vputils/#a0c663bf15e8398176f591270e7676f96">isUniformAcrossVFsAndUFs</a>(R-&gt;getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>(&#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> &#42;) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A value is considered non-uniform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unless proven otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
